channel.title: RuneRevival 317 PKING server
channel.description:
[center]Introduction: Rune-Revival is known to be a 317 SpawnScape remake. Currently we are still in beta but are expanding to build our playerbase. Our server is very stable and is hosted on a VPS(currently until upgrade is available). Skilling plays an important role because you will be able to earn a lot of money that way. As for our SpawnScape remake:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img][url=http://Rune-Revival.com]Home || Rune-Revival[/url] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][url=http://Rune-Revival.com/play]Play Now || Rune-Revival[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qgacD.png[/img][url=http://Rune-Revival.com/vote]Vote || Rune-Revival[/url]
Features -Working EP System -New combaticons working 100% -New hitmarks -Amzing fullscreen, one of the best -Working clan wars -Worlwide skilling -All skills working -New bosses such as Seat troll and barrelchest -Kalphite queen morphing -Pest Control -Fight Arena -Flawless switching -Working Rune essence mining area -3 level slayer tower -Working hand cannon w/ special -Working xp counter -Auto donation system -Vote for rewards system -Overload's -Npc clipping 100% -Player clipping 100% -SOL working special attack -All dupes patched -Memory leak/Deadlocks have been patched -Can hold 400 players no lag (tested) -Smf Forums -Dedicated Server -Vote for Rewards -All Skills Trainable -All bosses you can think of -Active Community & Forums -New Client Interfaces -Friendly Staff -Great combat -Godwars -Public Fight Cave -Working Autocasting -Clue Scrolls -Pvp Armour -Spirit Shields with proper effects -Fully Working ClanChat -Multi Barrage -Perfect Item Switching -Npcs/Monster locations same as on Runescape -Donator special features -Great PK Point system + PK Point Shop [/center]
Screenshots
SpawnScape commands [img]http://i.imgur.com/CcTo7oo.png[/img]
Buying Premade sets, dialogues are tiny, but it says would you like to buy this for X amount of cash? [img]http://i.imgur.com/YJrpXoY.png[/img]
Skilling Points [img]http://i.imgur.com/SYxRTkv.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1efe5zQ.png[/img] [url=http://i.imgur.com/1sSFcYW.png]http://i.imgur.com/1sSFcYW.png[/url]
FunPk [img]http://i.imgur.com/fplI4mE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qyejWFz.png[/img]
KillStreaks with bounties [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZxNIJYD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9eSzDXc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DKxPLH5.png[/img]
PVM [img]http://i.imgur.com/AyioEHO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ChWxF9w.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/w3wOl1Q.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nLMVqpJ.png[/img] Bosses give points [img]http://i.imgur.com/MrMIAhu.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img][url=http://Rune-Revival.com]Home || Rune-Revival[/url] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][url=http://Rune-Revival.com/play]Play Now || Rune-Revival[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qgacD.png[/img][url=http://Rune-Revival.com/vote]Vote || Rune-Revival[/url]

item.title: RuneRevival 317 PKING server
item.dc:creator: @amarad amarad
item.description:
@amarad wrote:

[center]Introduction:
Rune-Revival is known to be a 317 SpawnScape remake. Currently we are still in beta but are expanding to build our playerbase. Our server is very stable and is hosted on a VPS(currently until upgrade is available). Skilling plays an important role because you will be able to earn a lot of money that way.
As for our SpawnScape remake:

Home || Rune-Revival
Play Now || Rune-Revival
Vote || Rune-Revival

Features
-Working EP System
-New combaticons working 100%
-New hitmarks
-Amzing fullscreen, one of the best
-Working clan wars
-Worlwide skilling
-All skills working
-New bosses such as Seat troll and barrelchest
-Kalphite queen morphing
-Pest Control
-Fight Arena
-Flawless switching
-Working Rune essence mining area
-3 level slayer tower
-Working hand cannon w/ special
-Working xp counter
-Auto donation system
-Vote for rewards system
-Overloadâ€™s
-Npc clipping 100%
-Player clipping 100%
-SOL working special attack
-All dupes patched
-Memory leak/Deadlocks have been patched
-Can hold 400 players no lag (tested)
-Smf Forums
-Dedicated Server
-Vote for Rewards
-All Skills Trainable
-All bosses you can think of
-Active Community & Forums
-New Client Interfaces
-Friendly Staff
-Great combat
-Godwars
-Public Fight Cave
-Working Autocasting
-Clue Scrolls
-Pvp Armour
-Spirit Shields with proper effects
-Fully Working ClanChat
-Multi Barrage
-Perfect Item Switching
-Npcs/Monster locations same as on Runescape
-Donator special features
-Great PK Point system + PK Point Shop
[/center]

Buying Premade sets, dialogues are tiny, but it says would you like to buy this for X amount of cash?
